sentence: The four-page letter was signed by Reps. Andy Biggs of Arizona; Chip Roy of Texas; Cliff Bentz of Oregon; Dan Bishop of North Carolina; Darrell Issa of California; Jim Jordan of Ohio; Ken Buck of Colorado; Louie Gohmert of Texas; Matt Gaetz of Florida; Michelle Fischbach of Minnesota; Mike Johnson of Louisiana; Scott Fitzgerald of Wisconsin; Tom McClintock of California; Tom Tiffany of Wisconsin; W. Gregory Steube of Florida and Victoria Spartz of Indiana.
author: Emily Zantow
title: House Republicans press DOJ on ‘racial discrimination’ in COVID-19 treatment policies

sentence: House Minority Leader Kevin McCarthy initially announced a slate of Republicans that included allies of Mr Trump like Reps Jim Banks of Indiana and Jim Jordan of Ohio.
author: Eric Garcia
title: RNC votes to censure Liz Cheney and Adam Kinzinger over January 6 committee investigation

sentence: But then House Speaker Nancy Pelosi vetoed the membership of Reps Jim Banks of Indiana and Jim Jordan of Ohio.
author: Eric Garcia
title: Republican National Committee sues the January 6 Committee for ‘unlawfully seizing information’
